snippet: Senator Richard Blumenthal of Connecticut asked the Justice Department to investigate whether airlines were engaging in anticompetitive behavior and colluding to limit capacity and drive up fares.
abstract: Sen Richard Blumenthal of Connecticut asks Justice Dept to investigate if airlines are colluding to limit capacity and force fares up.
lead_paragraph: Senator Richard Blumenthal of Connecticut asked the Justice Department to investigate whether airlines were engaging in anticompetitive behavior and colluding to limit capacity and drive up fares.

headline.main: Senator Urges Inquiry Into Airline Behavior
headline.print_headline: Senator Urges Inquiry Into Airline Behavior
